title: India to become third largest economy with USD 5 trillion GDP in three years: Finance Ministry
description:
India to become third largest economy with USD 5 trillion GDP in three years: Finance Ministry India was the 10th largest economy with a GDP of USD 1.9 trillion a decade ago, but now it stands as the 5th largest at USD 3.7 trillion.

New Delhi:

India is projected to become the world's third-largest...
